profile.name: Faisal Ahmed
profile.summary: Experienced Data Engineer and Software Validation Lead with 13+ years of expertise in designing and optimizing scalable data pipelines and ensuring data accuracy and governance across automotive, e-commerce, and IoT domains. Proficient in Python, SQL, Snowflake and hands-on experience with AWS and Kafka, with strong skills in data modeling, real-time streaming, and automation. Adept at delivering interactive dashboards and actionable insights, driving operational efficiency and reducing manual validation efforts.
profile.title: Software Validation Technical Lead, Data Collection & Distribution

key_skills.Data Validation, Pipelines & Governance: Led end-to-end data collection, validation, and distribution for telematics and e-commerce data using **Snowflake, Kafka, and Python**. Designed automated validation frameworks and dashboards (**Streamlit, Grafana**) to ensure data accuracy, quality, and governance, driving operational efficiency.

key_skills.Python Automation & Framework Design: Architected and deployed multiple scalable **Python** automation frameworks and tools for QA and testing. Expertise includes developing keyword-based systems, HMI automation (PyQT), and using libraries like Pandas for data manipulation.

key_skills.Embedded Systems & Automotive Validation: 13+ years of experience in system testing and HIL/ECU validation for automotive active safety (ABS, TCS) and HVAC systems. Proficient with **CAN, J1939 protocols**, and tools like **CANoe, CANalyzer, and LabCar**.

key_skills.Technical Leadership & Process: Strong understanding of **SDLC, STLC, and Agile** methodologies. Experienced in leading software test teams, defining DVP&R and test plans, and providing technical consultation on Python application architecture.
